title: Brainrot Merge: Drop Puzzle
description: Brainrot Merge: Drop Puzzle is a wildly absurd merge puzzle game where quirky creatures evolve into chaotic meme-powered icons. Drop and combine animals to unlock hilarious AI-generated characters, each more bizarre than the last. With endless levels, unexpected surprises, and brain-zapping humor, every merge brings you one step closer to the ultimate meme monster.
